macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Wall Street Closes Higher for Fourth Straight Day
items.summary: The Dow Jones rose 0.2% to 48,442.41, Nasdaq gained 0.6% to 23,561.84 led by Marvell Technology up 3.4%, and S&P 500 advanced 0.4% to a new all-time high of 6,909.79, driven by AI and tech momentum amid mixed economic data including a drop in the Present Situation Index to 116.8.

items.title: S&P 500 Hits Record High at 6,912
items.summary: The S&P 500 rose 0.04% to 6,912 on December 24, following a 0.52% gain to 6,914 on December 23, with megacaps like Nvidia up 2.5%, Broadcom 2.2%, Amazon and Alphabet 1.3% leading the advance in tech and energy sectors.

items.title: US Stocks Push Higher Near Record Highs
items.summary: U.S. stocks continued upward in the holiday-shortened week, with S&P 500 closing near record highs supported by broad gains; European equity futures remained largely flat.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin and major altcoins slip as crypto market cap dips below $3T
items.summary: Bitcoin and major altcoins fell on broad crypto weakness, dragging total crypto market value down to about $2.97 trillion; Ether, Solana and Cardano were among the decliners amid lingering BTC weakness despite record highs in global stocks.[4][6]

items.title: Binance market update: most large-cap tokens trading lower; MOVE, AVNT, ZBT outperform
items.summary: Binance reports the majority of major cryptocurrencies are trading lower while token outperformers for the period include MOVE (+33%), AVNT (+20%) and ZBT (+19%), reflecting mixed intra‑day performance across markets.[5]

items.title: SEC charges firms over $14M crypto scam using fake AI investment tips
items.summary: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission filed charges alleging an elaborate $14 million cryptocurrency fraud that used WhatsApp groups, fake AI‑generated trading tips and bogus trading platforms to defraud U.S. investors, naming multiple companies and investment clubs in the complaint.[2]
items.source: The Hacker News (reporting on SEC action)

items.title: American Bitcoin Corp (ABTC) shares plunge over 85% since spinoff
items.summary: Shares of American Bitcoin Corp have dropped more than 85% from post‑spinoff highs amid a broader BTC pullback, weak miner economics (falling hashprice) and a large tranche of unlocked shares flooding the market, according to reporting on the miner’s stock performance.[1]

items.title: Opinion: Major cryptocurrencies have lost over $1.2T since early October
items.summary: An opinion piece reports that from early October through mid‑December major cryptocurrencies lost more than $1.2 trillion in market capitalization, highlighting the scale of recent market contraction.[3]

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Stanford Researchers Unveil 3D Chip to Overcome AI Hardware Bottleneck
items.summary: Stanford University researchers have developed a novel 3D computer chip that stacks memory and computing elements vertically, outperforming 2D chips by up to four times and promising up to 12-fold improvements on AI workloads like LLaMA. The U.S.-manufactured prototype addresses data movement bottlenecks critical for AI efficiency.

items.title: GenEnv Training System Boosts AI Agent Performance by 40% with Data Efficiency
items.summary: Researchers introduced GenEnv, a co-evolutionary training system using adaptive simulated environments, achieving up to +40.3% improvement on ALFWorld benchmarks over 7B baselines while using 3.3 times less data than Gemini 2.5 Pro augmentation. It enhances agent reasoning and provides a scalable path for LLM agent training.

items.title: Google Cloud CEO Details Decade-Long Strategy for AI Energy Efficiency and Silicon Innovation
items.summary: Google Cloud CEO Thomas Kurian highlighted a 10-year foresight into AI bottlenecks like specialized silicon and power scarcity, with energy-efficient TPUs designed for maximum flops per energy unit. The company employs AI-managed data centers and diversified energy strategies amid surging AI demands.

items.title: MIT-Mecalux Collaboration Advances AI for Autonomous Logistics and Warehouse Robots
items.summary: MIT and Mecalux are developing self-learning AI models for order allocation, distribution, and reinforcement learning to optimize autonomous mobile robots (AMRs) in dynamic warehouses. The systems adapt to complex environments, enhancing efficiency and future-proofing supply chains.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Crossout Releases Small Update with New Year Workbench Enhancements
items.summary: Crossout launched a small update on December 24, 2025, adding upgraded parts to the New Year workbench, fixing crashes related to outdated processors, and resolving various bugs in the New Year's Engineer garage.

items.title: New Report Suggests Imminent Witcher 3 DLC Release
items.summary: A Polish analyst's report indicates an upcoming Witcher 3 DLC with a potentially imminent release date, alongside discussions on long-term support from CD Projekt Red including final patches and collaboration with Fool's Theory.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
